definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: come (in Heb. only poet.) (Ar. 0’atay, Sab. [[אתו]] DHM:ZMG 1875, 597; 1888, 343, Aram. [[אֲתָא]], 0to0)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. ´[[א]] De 33:2; [[אָתָא]] Is 21:12 v. Ges:§ 75 R. 22; 1 pl. [[אָתָנוּ]] Je 3:22; Impf. [[יֶאֱתֶה]] Job 37:22, Pr 1:27; [[וַיֵּתֵא]] De 33:21 (= [[וַיֶּאֱתֶה]] cf. Di Kö:i. 577), [[וַיַּאת]] Is 41:25; sf. [[וַיֶּאֱתָיֵנִי]] Job 3:25; 3 fs. [[תֵּאתֶה]] Mic 4:3; 3 mpl. [[יֶאֱתָ֫יוּ]] Job 16:22 + 2 t.; [[וַיֶּאֱתָיוּ֑ן]] Is 41:5; Imv. mpl. [[אֵתָ֫יוּ]] Is 21:12 + 2 t.; Pt. fpl. [[אׂתִיּוֹת]] Is 41:23 + 2 t.;—come, of men De 33:21, Ps 68:32, Is 41:25, Is 56:12 Imv. = come now, with hostile purpose Job 30:14, of men unto ´[[י]] Je 3:22 (sq. [[לְ]]) cf. Is 21:12; of ´[[י]] De 33:2; of ends of earth, etc., personif. Is 41:5; of time, morning Is 21:12, years Job 16:22; of weather Job 37:22; of beasts, to devour Is 56:9 (sq. inf.), of calamity Pr 1:27, Job 3:25 come upon, c. sf., of dominion Mic 4:8 (sq. [[עַד]]). Pt. pl. fem. as subst. things to come, future things Is 41:23, Is 44:7, Is 45:11.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: bring, Imv. [[הֵתָ֫יוּ מַיִם]] Is 21:14 bring water (on form, for [[הֶאֱתוּ]] cf. Di EW:§ 141 a Ges:§ 68, 2 R. 1); Je 12:9 bring beasts, to devour.
